formula: Product(i^2+1, i=2..n-1) (n>2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 26 2002From _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 13 2015: (Start)a(n) = A101686(n-1)/2.a(n) ~ (n-1)!^2 * sinh(Pi)/(2*Pi).(End)
mathematica: a[n_] := Pochhammer[2-I, n-2]*Pochhammer[2+I, n-2]; a[1] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 15}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 21 2012, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)Join[{1},FoldList[Times,1,Range[2,20]^2+1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 04 2013 *)Clear[a]; a[1]=1; a[n_]:=a[n]=Sum[i^2*a[i],{i,1,n-1}]; Table[a[n],{n,1,20}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 13 2015 *)
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Dec 17 1999
